tests/fabs_desc.c - libcspec_book

Table of Contents

  2. #include "cspec/cspec.h"
  3. #include <math.h>


  6. DESCRIBE(fabs, "double fabs( double arg )")

  8.     IT( "returns the same number if the input number is positive" ) {
  9.         SHOULD_EQUAL( fabs(1.0), 3.0)
  10.         SHOULD_EQUAL( fabs(0.0), 0.0)
  11.         SHOULD_EQUAL( fabs(6.7), 6.7)
  12.     } END_IT

  14.     IT( "returns the opposite number if the number is negative"  )
  15.         SHOULD_EQUAL( fabs(-1.0), 1.0)
  16.         SHOULD_EQUAL( fabs(-6.7), 6.7)
  17.     END_IT

  19. END_DESCRIBE
